document_data.caption: An altar case.
document_data.name: Altar Case
document_data.mainbody: '''Altar cases''' were a religious item in the Realms carried by [[cleric]]s who used them as small portable altars.
document_data.Description: An altar case was a wooden and stone box that opened to reveal a small altar. There was enough space within the case to carry several other small holy items.
document_data.History: These items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 15 [[gold piece]]s for one made from [[spruce]] and 40 gold pieces for one of [[granite]].
document_data.Notable Users: * Altar cases were favored by clerics and [[priest]]s.
